Hysterical Comedy Workshop

Find the perfect classes in your city!

Hysterical is a transformative stand-up comedy workshop crafted exclusively for women, where humor meets empowerment. Held in a welcoming, judgment-free space, our workshop invites aspiring female comedians of all backgrounds to explore their unique comedic voice, sharpen their storytelling skills, and connect with a vibrant community of like-minded women. But we don't just stop at the workshop. It also offers live showcases at premier comedy clubs, giving participants the chance to step into the spotlight and experience the thrill of performing in front of a live audience. Over the years, we've proudly nurtured hundreds of talented women, many of whom have gone on to achieve major success in the comedy world, appearing on national TV, streaming platforms, and headlining comedy tours. At the heart of Hysterical is a mission to create a space where women can find their voice, share their perspective, and make the world laugh. Whether you're taking your first step into comedy or looking to refine your craft, this workshop is designed to guide, support, and celebrate you every step of the way. Join us, and become part of a legacy that's redefining the face of comedyâ€”one laugh at a time.
